ValidationRule.description: Prevent users from changing the Type of an Opportunity to Renewal if it has certain Voice products in scope.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISCHANGED(Type) && ISPICKVAL(Type,'Renewal') && ( INCLUDES( Product_s_in_scope__c, 'Voice')|| INCLUDES( Product_s_in_scope__c, 'Dual SIM') || INCLUDES( Product_s_in_scope__c, 'M2M')|| INCLUDES( Product_s_in_scope__c, 'MBB') || INCLUDES( Product_s_in_scope__c, 'Unified Communication') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are not allowed to change this opportunity to type Renewal as it has one of the following products in scope: Voice, Dual SIM, M2M, MBB or Unified Communication.
